languages.text: "Я бы мог оценить наши шансы с учетом моих скромных познаний об этом месте... но, наверное, в этой ситуации от меня ждут не сухих фактов, да?" {n}Дознаватель бережным касанием поворачивает ваше лицо к себе.{/n} "Если понадобится, я готов отдать свою жизнь, чтобы ты вернулась домой".

traits.locale_text: "Я бы мог оценить наши шансы с учетом моих скромных познаний об этом месте... но, наверное, в этой ситуации от меня ждут не сухих фактов, да?" {n}Дознаватель берет вас за подбородок и поворачивает к себе.{/n} "Если понадобится, я готов отдать свою жизнь, чтобы ты вернулась домой".

languages.text: "I could calculate our chances based on my limited knowledge of this place... but I don't think this situation calls for cold facts, does it?" {n}Heinrix gently turns your face to his.{/n} "If it comes to it, I will lay down my life to get you home."
languages.original_text: "Я бы мог оценить наши шансы с учетом моих скромных познаний об этом месте... но, наверное, в этой ситуации от меня ждут не сухих фактов, да?" {n}Дознаватель бережным касанием поворачивает ваше лицо к себе.{/n} "Если понадобится, я готов отдать свою жизнь, чтобы ты вернулась домой".

traits.locale_text: "I could calculate our chances based on my limited knowledge of this place... but I don't think this situation calls for cold facts, does it?" {n}Heinrix gently takes your chin and turns your face to his.{/n} "If it comes to it, I will lay down my life to get you home."

"I could calculate our chances based on my limited knowledge of this place... but I don't think this situation calls for cold facts, does it?" {n}Heinrix gently takes your chin and turns your face to his.{/n} "If it comes to it, I will lay down my life to get you home."

"I could calculate our chances based on my limited knowledge of this place... but I don't think this situation calls for cold facts, does it?" {n}Heinrix gently takes your chin and turns your face to his.{/n} "If it comes to it, I will lay down my life to get you home."

"I could calculate our chances based on my limited knowledge of this place... but I don't think this situation calls for cold facts, does it?" {n}Heinrix gently turns your face to his.{/n} "If it comes to it, I will lay down my life to get you home."

"I could calculate our chances based on my limited knowledge of this place... but I don't think this situation calls for cold facts, does it?" {n}Heinrix gently turns your face to his.{/n} "If it comes to it, I will lay down my life to get you home."

languages.text: «Podría calcular nuestras probabilidades de éxito basándome en lo poco que sé sobre el lugar... pero creo que en esta situación la frialdad de los hechos sobra, ¿no?». {n}Heinrix gira tu cara hacia la suya.{/n} «Si llegara el caso, daré mi vida para que pueda regresar a casa».
languages.original_text: "I could calculate our chances based on my limited knowledge of this place... but I don't think this situation calls for cold facts, does it?" {n}Heinrix gently turns your face to his.{/n} "If it comes to it, I will lay down my life to get you home."

traits.locale_text: «Podría calcular nuestras probabilidades de éxito basándome en lo poco que sé sobre el lugar... pero creo que en esta situación la frialdad de los hechos sobra, ¿no?». {n}Heinrix gira tu cara hacia la suya.{/n} «Si llegara el caso, daré mi vida para que pueda regresar a casa».

languages.text: 「この場所に関する限られた情報を元に脱出の確率を算出することはできるが… こんな時に冷静に事実を述べても仕方ないのでは？」{n}ハインリックスがこちらの顔をそっと彼のほうへ向けた。{/n}「いざとなったら、命を捨ててでもあなたを故郷へ帰そう」
languages.original_text: "I could calculate our chances based on my limited knowledge of this place... but I don't think this situation calls for cold facts, does it?" {n}Heinrix gently turns your face to his.{/n} "If it comes to it, I will lay down my life to get you home."

traits.locale_text: 「この場所に関する限られた情報を元に脱出の確率を算出することはできるが… こんな時に冷静に事実を述べても仕方ないのでは？」{n}ハインリックスがこちらの顔をそっと彼のほうへ向けた。{/n}「いざとなったら、命を捨ててでもあなたを故郷へ帰そう」

languages.text: “根据我对这里有限的了解，我很清楚我们成功的概率有多少……鉴于眼下这种情况，就没必要再了解这冷冰冰的数据了，对吧？”{n}海因里希温柔地转过你的脸，对上他的目光。{/n}“如果可以，我愿意牺牲这条性命，送你回家。”
languages.original_text: "I could calculate our chances based on my limited knowledge of this place... but I don't think this situation calls for cold facts, does it?" {n}Heinrix gently turns your face to his.{/n} "If it comes to it, I will lay down my life to get you home."

traits.locale_text: “根据我对这里有限的了解，我很清楚我们成功的概率有多少……鉴于眼下这种情况，就没必要再了解这冷冰冰的数据了，对吧？”{n}海因里希温柔地转过你的脸，对上他的目光。{/n}“如果可以，我愿意牺牲这条性命，送你回家。”

languages.text: « Je pourrais calculer nos chances sur la base de ma connaissance limitée de cet endroit... mais je ne crois pas que cette situation exige des données précises, n'est-ce pas ? {n}dit Heinrix en tournant votre visage vers lui.{/n} S'il faut en arriver là, je donnerai ma vie pour vous ramener {mf|sain et sauf|saine et sauve}. »
languages.original_text: "I could calculate our chances based on my limited knowledge of this place... but I don't think this situation calls for cold facts, does it?" {n}Heinrix gently turns your face to his.{/n} "If it comes to it, I will lay down my life to get you home."

traits.locale_text: « Je pourrais calculer nos chances sur la base de ma connaissance limitée de cet endroit... mais je ne crois pas que cette situation exige des données précises, n'est-ce pas ? {n}dit Heinrix en tournant votre visage vers lui.{/n} S'il faut en arriver là, je donnerai ma vie pour vous ramener {mf|sain et sauf|saine et sauve}. »

languages.text: "Ich könnte basierend auf meinem begrenzten Wissen unsere Chancen berechnen ... Aber diese Situation ruft wohl kaum nach harten Fakten, was?" {n}Heinrix dreht dein Gesicht sanft zu sich.{/n} "Wenn es dazu kommt, werde ich mein Leben opfern, um Euch nach Hause zu bringen."
languages.original_text: "I could calculate our chances based on my limited knowledge of this place... but I don't think this situation calls for cold facts, does it?" {n}Heinrix gently turns your face to his.{/n} "If it comes to it, I will lay down my life to get you home."

traits.locale_text: "Ich könnte basierend auf meinem begrenzten Wissen unsere Chancen berechnen ... Aber diese Situation ruft wohl kaum nach harten Fakten, was?" {n}Heinrix dreht dein Gesicht sanft zu sich.{/n} "Wenn es dazu kommt, werde ich mein Leben opfern, um Euch nach Hause zu bringen."

languages.text: "Buraya dair sınırlı bilgime dayanarak ihtimallerimizi hesaplayabilirim ama... İçinde bulunduğumuz vaziyetin somut gerçeklere ihtiyacı yok sanki?" {n}Heinrix, yüzünü nazikçe kendisine çeviriyor.{/n} "İş bu aşamaya gelirse seni eve göndermek için canımdan vazgeçerim."
languages.original_text: "I could calculate our chances based on my limited knowledge of this place... but I don't think this situation calls for cold facts, does it?" {n}Heinrix gently turns your face to his.{/n} "If it comes to it, I will lay down my life to get you home."
